you can take taxi to Arbanasi, it should cost 3-5 levs. There is also an infrequent local bus. The hike from Arbanassi to Veliko Turnovo is especially scenic.
It is easy to walk all around town.

Several churches. The most impressive one is the Nativity Church, entirey covered with frescos.

There are also museum houses. In the central square of Arbanasi you can find a tourist info board with map.
There are taxis in central square. There's also one bus stop in the center, and there are bus time tables, so if you are lucky you can take a cheap bus journey.
